page.title: 02Arts and Crafts
page.content: There is a great deal of interest in arts and crafts and plenty of opportunity for people to improve their skills and extend their know- ledge in a variety of subjects offered. Evening classes, most of them organised by the local education authority, include instruction in upholstery, needlework, painting, pottery, woodwork, and ironwork. Very skilled instruction is given by a local lady in the art of cake decoration: her work is well known throughout the county - and even further afield. Flower arranging is a very popular craft and this reaches a very high standard at the competitions held in connection with the local festivals, flower shows, and galas.
